title: Delhi LG flags off 320 electric buses, says they will strengthen fight against pollution
description: Delhi Lt Governor V K Saxena launched 320 electric buses, raising the city's count to 1,970. This move aims to combat pollution. Transport Minister Kailash Gahlot highlighted that Delhi now has the most electric buses in India and aims for 80% of its fleet to be electric by 2025.
